description:
BLUELOUNGE Kii For Lightning Connector - BLACK
 

Kii is as lightweight and inconspicuous as any other key and allows users to plug in to charge or sync devices from any computer without having to carry a charger or tote around a cable connector.
 
In Use
Kii fits directly on your keychain with the rest of your keys. It's dual-sided: one end is an Apple connector to connect to your iPhone, iPad or iPod and the other is a USB to plug directly in to your laptop. It is an ultra portable solution that can easily be tucked into a pocket or bag to have handy anytime you may need to charge or sync on-the-go.
name: Bluelounge Kii For Lightning Connector - BLACK

description:
INNOVATIVE AND FASHIONABLE Asobu Flavour U see is the new upgraded, modern infuser, metallic looking bottle for those that care about fashion and health.
DURABLE, INSULATED AND PORTABLE At 16 ounce this infusion water bottle is constructed of double wall insulated stainless steel and bpa free tritan to give you a long lasting bottle that will keep you beverage cold for 12 hours.
HEALTHY DRINKING OPTION The clear Tritan BPA free see-through center section suspends the fruit, mint or other contents in your chilled water between two filters preventing any bulk pulp from entering the drinking section but giving you a great tasting water.
ENDLESS OPTIONS Drinking water boring? Think Fruits, veggies, herbs, tea, still or sparkling water and the sky’s the limit (just no hot water) and your run, gym workout or day at the office just got a bit more interesting.
GREAT GIFT OPTION Available in 5 stunning colors great gift option for Dad, Mom, Teacher and Friend for Christmas, Holiday, Year end or just to say Thank you.
name: Asobu Stainless Steel BPA Free Fruit Infuser Slim Water Bottle 500 ml 16oz Silver

description:
Asobu latest addition to the Asobu first originally designed flavor it 2 go infusion bottles. Now with a modern updated look.
Nowadays your water bottle needs to be not only functional but it must make a fashion statement as well. The Asobu Flavor U See has it all. The modern metallic styling gives this a unique urban, chic look. At 16 Ounces this ideal fashion accessory is easy to carry when running, hiking or working out.
Made with double walled insulated stainless steel to keep your drink nice and chilled for 12 hours and bpa free see-through Tritan this bottle is a real keeper.
We all know that drinking water is good for us but getting through those 8 cups a day can be real tough. That’s what infusion water is for. Get out your Lemons, limes, blueberries, cinnamon, mint and cucumbers out and get mixing. This makes the water so much more interesting .
So how does it work? Unscrew the middle tritan section take off one of the filters and fill with fruit, veggies or herbs. Put it back together and fill with water from the top.
And that’s it let is sit for a bit and enjoy a delicious tasting water from a stunning bottle.
No More Sugary Drinks
We all know that drinking water is good for us but getting through those 8 cups a day can be real tough. Now we all know Soda is a no no but did you know that store bough fruit water is full of sugar as well. Now with homemade fruit infused water you can get flavor and nutrition.
 

INNOVATIVE AND FASHIONABLE Asobu Flavour U see is the new upgraded, modern infuser, metallic looking bottle for those that care about fashion and health.
DURABLE, INSULATED AND PORTABLE At 16 ounce this infusion water bottle is constructed of double wall insulated stainless steel and bpa free tritan to give you a long lasting bottle that will keep you beverage cold for 12 hours.
HEALTHY DRINKING OPTION The clear Tritan BPA free see-through center section suspends the fruit, mint or other contents in your chilled water between two filters preventing any bulk pulp from entering the drinking section but giving you a great tasting water.
ENDLESS OPTIONS Drinking water boring? Think Fruits, veggies, herbs, tea, still or sparkling water and the sky’s the limit (just no hot water) and your run, gym workout or day at the office just got a bit more interesting.
GREAT GIFT OPTION Available in 5 stunning colors great gift option for Dad, Mom, Teacher and Friend for Christmas, Holiday, Year end or just to say Thank you.


 
Try some of these combinations for amazing flavor:

Cucumbers and Mint Leaves
Blueberry, Raspberry and Lemon
Pineapple and Mint Leaves
Apple and cinnamon sticks (no ground clogs water)
Watermelon cubes and Basil Leaves
Strawberries and lemon (with rind)
Lime, ginger and basil
Orange and Cinnmon Sticks
Lemon and Thyme
Pear and Fennel
name: Asobu Flavor Stainless Steel Fruit Infuser Slim Water Bottle 500 ml

description:
With four USB ports and a 6-foot long charging cable, the Belkin Road Rockstar allows front-seat and backseat passengers to simultaneously charge their tablets or smartphones.
A 7.2-amp output gives you optimal charging speeds so you can get a speedy charge even as you use your device. The Road Rockstar plugs into your car's CLA and clips to the driver/passenger backseat pocket so backseat passengers can reach it with ease.

Charge up to Four Devices
The Belkin Road Rockstar has four built-in USB ports, which means up to four people can charge their devices at once.
Backseat passengers can access charging ports with ease thanks to a 6-foot long connector cable.
With a removable clip for the driver/passenger backseat pocket, you'll have a secure and easily accessible way to attach the two-port backseat charger.
FEATURES


Seamlessly charge 4 devices simultaneously while on the go
Perfect for watching movies on long road trips
Designed with a 6-foot cable, and 4 usb ports
Extending usb hub - allow back seat passengers to easily charge devices
Tablet charging - charge 2 tablets simultaneously on extending usb hub
name: BELKIN Road Rockstar 4 Port USB 7.2 AMP 32 Watt Car Charger

description:
BEST KIDS HEADPHONES FOR SAFE AUDIO: BuddyPhones were designed for safety, comfort, and fun. Comes with 6 sets of decorative vinyl stickers for personalization. Appropriate for all girls, boys, toddlers, and kids between the age of 3 - 10. All BuddyPhones are made with soft and comfortable hypoallergenic padding. The 3 ft. cable is flat to prevent tangles and the foldable design makes travelling with and storing the headphones as easy as can be.
ALWAYS-ON VOLUME LIMITER: Volume is limited to a child safe level of 85 dB. This volume level is recommended by the World Health Organization as the max volume for safe hearing for children.
AWARD-WINNING DESIGN FOR CHILDREN: BuddyPhones are tailor made for children, featuring a super durable and bendable headband that is adjustable for a perfect fit. Their unique, kid-friendly design has won BuddyPhones Explore Foldable numerous awards including the 2017 Parent's Choice Award!
EASY SHARING: The BuddyCable includes a patented, built-in audio splitter for sharing with friends. Up to 4 BuddyPhones can be shared in the same device.
ADDITIONAL FEATURES AND COMPATIBILITY: The included 3.5mm gold plated audio jack works with Apple iPads and iPhones, Amazon Fire, Kindle, Samsung, and all Smartphones. They are perfect for use in home, car or school. also feature an in-line microphone with answering button. Travel bag included.
name: OnanOff Buddyphones Explore Foldable Kids Safe Headphones with Mic - Blue

FEATURES




STYLISH EARBUD - These Happy Plugs earbuds are fitted to be placed in your ear right outside of the ear canal. They have a relaxed fit that will fit most ears comfortably. These earbuds are jewelry and sound combined.
HIGH-QUALITY SOUND - Earphones typically have drivers between 8 and 15 mm. These earbuds have 14.2 mm handmade driver units in each ear piece. They have a sensitivity of 101 DB. Make a fashion statement while enjoying high-performance audio.
MICROPHONE AND REMOTE - Life gets crazy and sometimes it can be pure chaos. The built-in microphone makes life more convenient because you can talk on the phone while doing other things. Amp up your multitasking game with Happy Plugs earphones.
DURABLE CORD - The connectivity technology of these earphones is wired. The wire is durable and sure to last. Whatever you’re doing or wherever you’re going, these headphones will provide you with an enjoyable listening experience.
COMPATIBILITY - These earphones are compatible with every device with an audio jack. These earphones come with a 3.5 mm audio jack. They are compatible with your iPhone or Samsung phone or other cellular device, tablet, walkman, and mp3 player.

description:
Designed to turn heads, engineered to maximise sound and shaped for a perfect fit these headphones will be your new favourite.
With over 6 hours of battery life and 220 hours of standby time, Earbud Plus Wireless II lets you listen throughout the day. The headphones also rests securely around your neck like a necklace, so you are always ready to listen to music, answer phone calls, and talk to Siri or Google Assistant. Designed and shaped by the form of your ears to fit more comfortably than any other headphone style. 
FEATURES


IN-EAR EARPHONE - These Happy Plugs earphones are fitted to be placed in your ear canal. They come with 3 pairs (S, M, and L) of silicone earbud covers so you can get the fit that is best for your ears. Because the silicone tips are inserted directly into the ear canal, they provide a noise cancelling effect for your enjoyment.
HIGH-QUALITY SOUND - Earphones typically have drivers between 8 and 15 mm. These earbuds have 14.2 mm handmade driver units in each ear piece. They have a sensitivity of 101 DB. Make a fashion statement while enjoying high-performance audio.
MICROPHONE AND REMOTE - Life gets crazy and sometimes it can be pure chaos. Being able to use your phone hands-free just makes everything easier. The built-in microphone makes life more convenient because you can talk on the phone while doing other things. Amp up your multitasking game with Happy Plugs earphones. They also have a built-in 1-button remote included for even more convenience.
name: Happy Plugs Wireless Earbud Plus II - Botanica Exotica

description:

Berlin is the ideal everyday Bluetooth earphone. 

It’s specially developed for those who seek a user friendly Bluetooth earphone with a sleek design and a comfortable fit. Whether you run between meetings, relax in an airplane or commute on a crowded bus, Berlin is your everyday companion. Easy to bring, easy to use and easy to enjoy! 



Scandinavian Style Berlin has soft silicone earbuds and silicone wing GoFit earbud-replacements for a snug and more secure fit. Their practical in-line remote features a mic and volume controls, so there’s no need to fumble for your device to answer calls or manage your music on the go. For extra functionality, the earphones can be joined together magnetically. They can be worn around the neck, always within reach, when not in use. 


Comfort 

Berlin comes with silicone earbuds for everyday use. If you prefer a more secure fit, use the complimentary winged GoFit silicone earbud-replacements, ideal for sports and life on the go. 


Extraordinary Listening Experience

FEATURES


IN-EAR EARPHONE - These Happy Plugs earphones are fitted to be placed in your ear canal. They come with 3 pairs (S, M, and L) of silicone earbud covers so you can get the fit that is best for your ears.
HIGH-QUALITY SOUND - In-ear earphones typically have drivers between 8 and 15 mm. Usually, the smaller the driver, the better the sound. These earbuds have 9 mm handmade driver units in each ear piece.
MICROPHONE AND REMOTE - Life gets crazy and sometimes it can be pure chaos. Being able to use your phone hands-free just makes everything easier. The microphone makes life more convenient because you can talk on the phone while doing other things.
DURABLE CORD - The connectivity technology of these earphones is wired. The wire is durable and sure to last. Use the Happy Plugs earphones while you’re running or working out, while you’re on the go, or while you binge-watch your fave show.
COMPATIBILITY - Happy Plugs earphones are compatible with every device with an audio jack. These stylish earphones come with a 3.5 mm audio jack. That means they are compatible with your iPhone or Samsung or tablet, walkman, mp3 player.

description:
InFlight Buddyphones allow you to choose from 3 max volume presets. Safe Flight Mode maxes at 94db and provides safe listening in louder environments. Safe Kid Mode (85db max) is great for normal listening. And, Safe Toddler Mode reduces the max volume to 75db, which is perfect for children with sensitive hearing, attention deficits, and/or autism.

FEATURES

3 volume settings: 94db, 85db, and 75db
BuddyCable integrated audio splitter allows up to 4 buddies to share the same device
Kit includes a 2-prong plug for airplanes and a convenient travel bag
Flat, detachable cable design minimizes choking hazards
Built-in microphone is convenient for talking and to use with learning apps



MORE FEATURES

BEST KIDS HEADPHONES FOR SAFE AUDIO: BuddyPhones were designed for safety, comfort, and fun. Comes with 6 sets of decorative vinyl stickers for personalization. Appropriate for all girls, boys, toddlers, and kids between the age of 3 - 10.
ALWAYS-ON VOLUME LIMITER: Inflight Series Volume is limited to a child safe level of a maximum of 94 dB. There are three volume limit settings 75 dB, 85dB, and 94dB depending on the environment your child is in. For airplane use, select the maximum volume of 94dB by using the child-proof switch.
AWARD-WINNING DESIGN FOR CHILDREN: BuddyPhones are tailor-made for children, featuring a super durable and bendable headband that is adjustable for a perfect fit. Their unique, kid-friendly design has won BuddyPhones Explore Foldable numerous awards including the 2017 Parent's Choice Award!
EASY SHARING: The BuddyCable includes a patented, built-in audio splitter for sharing with friends. Up to 4 BuddyPhones can be shared in the same device.
ADDITIONAL FEATURES AND COMPATIBILITY: The included 3.5mm gold-plated audio jack works with Apple iPads and iPhones, Amazon Fire, Kindle, Samsung, and all Smartphones. They are perfect for use in home, car or school. Also feature an in-line microphone with the answering button. Travel bag included.
name: OnanOff Buddyphones InFlight Foldable Kids Safe Headphones - Pink

description:
Introducing Evolution S3 — the world’s best engineered travel pillow. Our innovative Seat Strap System eliminates head drop and the instinctive 'whiplash' response to reopen obstructed airways. Raised side supports prevent lateral movement or 'bobble-head' and keep you from drooling on your seat mate's shoulder.
The thin back ensures proper spine alignment, relaxes your back, and releases tension that otherwise strains taut neck and shoulder muscles. An adjustable front clasp customizes fit for individual comfort.
Our premium memory foam core is protected by a moisture-wicking, machine-washable cover that keeps your neck dry and stays fresh-looking. Pillow compacts to half its size in travel case that attaches to carry-on for critical space savings.
FEATURES:


SEAT STRAP SYSTEM -- WATCH VIDEO IMAGE: Our patent-pending Seat Strap System allows the pillow to be strapped to the airplane head-rest wings to keep your head from falling forward as you sleep on long airplane flights. It can be adjusted to fit the pillow’s flat back on or below the wings to better fit tall and short people. Guaranteed to keep you head in place, you can now enjoy complete chin and side support while you rest and relax.
360 CHIN/HEAD SUPPORT: Unlike other neck pillows, the award winning Evolution S3 travel pillow is designed with premium memory foam that provides 360 degree total comfort whether your head leans forward or to the side.
IMPROVED TRAVEL BAG: The Evolution S3 Travel Neck Pillow was built for convenience and portability. It comes with an improved travel bag that allows the neck pillow to compress down to ½ its size. The bag also has two convenient pockets to store small items and a secure plastic clip that can attach to your luggage to save valuable bag space.
name: CABEAU Memory Foam Evolution S3 Pillow - Cardinal

Train. Play. Live Unleashed.
Train, play and live unleashed with Pump, the ultimate multi-sport wireless headphone. A rugged, military-grade design keeps water and debris out, protecting the premium audio components tuned to let the beat set the pace. No matter how hard you go or how tough the conditions, move with freedom and confidence and let nothing limit where the music takes you.





Waterproof, Sweatproof, Dustproof, Workoutproof.



Eneregize Your Audio
PUMP redefines Bluetooth audio, creating an audiophile-grade music experience that cannot be matched by wireless rivals. We call this breakthrough experience: Energize HD Audio.


Ready For The Hardest Workout
Teflon coating and Kevlar shielding block water, salt, dust and sweat from entering the Pump, making it more rugged and longer lasting.


Stays On When Others Let Go
With Pump's Superfit System, no matter how hard you go, they won't budge. They stay with you during rigorous activity, allowing you to train and play with complete freedom and confidence.


Comfort To Push Through That Extra Mile
Pump’s lightweight design, consisting of a soft rubberized casing, prevents chafing behind and inside the ear during intense movement. Combined with ComfortSeal and Awareness tips that reduce listening fatigue and allow you to stay in tune with your surroundings, the ergonomic design provides a natural feel that compliments the head instead of competing with it.





Greater Power. More Freedom.
With best-in-class wireless range, Pump allows you to train untethered up to 100 feet away from your Bluetooth enabled device. And with up to eight hours of continuous battery life you are free to train without the worry of the music stopping in the middle of your workout.

description:
BEST WIRELESS HEADPHONES FOR KIDS: BuddyPhones PLAY are the safe, comfortable and durable Bluetooth headphones you have been waiting for. The incredible 14-hour battery life allows for up to 6 days of use without charging (2-3 hours/day). They feature an adjustable headband so that they can grow with your child and soft hypo-allergenic cushions make them super comfortable for years to come. Works with all Bluetooth enabled devices such as iPads, iPhones, Amazon Kindle, car DVD players & more.
SAFE LISTENING: The PLAY Bluetooth over the ear headphones feature volume limiting control to ensure that your child's ears are protected from loud noise. Set the volume level to a maximum of 75 dB for toddlers, 85 dB for kids, or to 94 dB when in noisy environments such as airplanes. Now all girls and boys can enjoy their favorite content without endangering their hearing. Also features the new StudyMode which uses proprietary technology to optimize vocal clarity & enhance speech at 94 dB max.
DURABLE & MADE FOR FUN: BuddyPhones PLAY were specifically designed for toddlers and children age 3 and older. They are extremely durable and children can safely use them in the car, at school, on airplanes and every day at home. Our Bluetooth headphones are made for travel. Each pair of headphones is foldable and comes with a travel bag and decorative stickers for customization.
EASY SHARING: Each pair of PLAY Bluetooth headphones come with an optional 3.5mm gold-plated BuddyCable that allows up to 4 children to listen to one device simultaneously. Additionally, the 2.5 ft BuddyCable can also be used for wired listening if Bluetooth is not available or if the battery has run out. Each headset comes with an integrated microphone for 2-way calling.
WARRANTY: We fully stand behind our product and want you to feel 100% confident about your purchase. That's why we offer a 2-year warranty for our headphones. If anything is not to your full satisfaction, simply reach out to us and we will make it right. Guaranteed!
name: Buddyphones PLAY Wireless Bluetooth Kids Safe Headphones for Kids - Blue

description:
Used by travelers and comfort connoisseurs alike, the Evolution Cool travel pillow by Cabeau is the premium choice. Unlike other neck pillows, the Evolution Cool is designed with proprietary dual-density memory foam that provides total comfort whether your head leans forward or to the side. You will fall asleep in seconds with the revolutionary 360 degree support and custom-adjustable magnetic clasp. Innovative cooling vent technology keeps the neck and head cool to ensure you get the rest you need on those long plane rides or road trips. The Evolution Cool neck pillow was built for convenience and portability; each comes with a deluxe travel bag that allows it to compress down to ½ its size. Do not worry about nasty smells or dirty germs, the removable cover makes it easy to wash and keep clean for your next vacation. Plus, it is even designed to fit most headphones so you can relax with your favorite tunes. Rest easy and wake up feeling fresh with the Evolution Cool travel pillow.

PREMIUM TRAVEL BAG: The Evolution Cool Travel Neck Pillow was built for convenience and portability. The bag also has two convenient pockets to store small items and a secure plastic clip that can attach to your luggage to save valuable airline bag space.
WASHABLE COVER: No need to worry about all those unwanted nasty smells or dirty germs, the Cabeau Evolution Cool Travel Pillow's removable cover makes it easy to wash and keep clean for your next vacation.

description:
BEST WIRELESS HEADPHONES FOR KIDS: BuddyPhones WAVE are the safe, comfortable and durable Bluetooth headphones you have been waiting for. The incredible 24-hour battery life allows for up to 10 days of use without charging (2-3 hours/day). They feature an adjustable headband so that they can grow with your child and soft hypo-allergenic cushions make them super comfortable for years to come. Works with all Bluetooth enabled devices such as iPads, iPhones, Amazon Kindle, car DVD players & more.
SAFE LISTENING: The WAVE Bluetooth over the ear headphones feature volume limiting control to ensure that your child's ears are protected from loud noise. Set the volume level to a maximum of 75 dB for toddlers, 85 dB for kids, or to 94 dB when in noisy environments such as airplanes. Now all girls and boys can enjoy their favorite content without endangering their hearing. Also features the new StudyMode which uses proprietary technology to optimize vocal clarity & enhance speech at 94 dB max.
DURABLE & WATERPROOF: BuddyPhones WAVE were specifically designed for toddlers and children age 3 and older. They are extremely durable and feature an IP67 spill/waterproof rating that allows them to withstand daily heavy usage. Children can safely use them in the car, pool, on the beach, at school, on airplanes and every day at home. Our Bluetooth headphones are made for travel. Each pair of headphones is foldable and comes with a travel bag and name tag stickers.
EASY SHARING: Each pair of WAVE Bluetooth headphones come with an optional 3.5mm gold-plated BuddyCable that allows up to 4 children to listen to one device simultaneously. Additionally, the 2.5 ft BuddyCable can also be used for wired listening if Bluetooth is not available or if the battery has run out. Each headset comes with an integrated microphone for 2-way calling.
WARRANTY: We fully stand behind our product and want you to feel 100% confident about your purchase. That's why we offer a 2-year warranty for our headphones. If anything is not to your full satisfaction, simply reach out to us and we will make it right. Guaranteed!
name: OnanOff Buddyphones Wave Bluetooth Kids Safe Headphones Waterproof Robot - Blue

1/2.9” 2Megapixel progressive CMOS ·

Max IR LEDs Length 30m · IP67, PoE

 Functions
True Day/Night A day/night mechanical IR cut filter makes this camera ideal for applications with fluctuating lighting conditions, delivering color images during the day and automatically switching to monochrome as the scene darkens
Regions of interest
Regions of Interest (ROI) is a user defined feature that allows the operator to monitor specific areas of a scene while still maintaining overall situational awareness of less important areas
Smart IR
With IR illumination, detailed images can be captured in low light or total darkness. The camera's Smart IR technology adjusts to the intensity of camera's infrared LEDs to compensate for the distance of an object. Smart IR technology prevents IR LEDS from whiting out images as they come closer to the camera. The camera's integrated infrared illumination provides high performance in extreme low-light environments up to 30m (98ft).
Image flip
Capturing unnecessary data such as surrounding hallway walls can increase storage requirements without any added value. The image flip feature allows the camera's image to be rotated in 90° increments for better video optimization
name: DH-IPC-HFW1220S  2MP IR Mini-Bullet Network Camera

The active ingredients are piroctone olamine, directly acting on the cause of dandruff, and Australian mint, which has antimicrobial and refreshing effects.

name: Barex EXL Purifying Anti-Dandruff Shampoo 250 ml

description:
There are many ways to achieve smooth, shiny hair: this is chemical, keratin straightening, etc. But the easiest and safest way is to use smoothing shampoos, masks, serums and oils. The effect lasts 1-2 days and the procedure must be repeated after each shampooing, but it is worth it. You do not injure your hair, but on the contrary smoothing it, provide it with nutrition, restoration and protection from thermal and other adverse effects. 
Ultra Shining Velvet Shampoo (Barex Italiana) creates the effect of soft, velvety hair. Eliminates excessive fluffiness, gives smoothness and obedience to the hair in the further care and styling. 
Argan oil - nourishes, moisturizes, gives hair density and shine. Sea buckthorn oil is a natural fruit oil. Restores and strengthens the hair, counteracting their stiffness. Contains an incredible amount of vitamins, minerals, nutrients of plant origin and antioxidants, the combination of which represents the perfect and complete recipe for beauty hair. 

Result of application:

Smooth, soft, velvet-like hair.
Moisturizes, gives density to hair. 

The composition of the product:
Sea buckthorn oil, argan oil. 
Mode of application:
Apply Contempora “Shining Velvet” shampoo to wet hair, massage and leave to act for a few minutes. Wash off with plenty of water. If necessary, repeat the procedure. Apply the Shining Velvet mask to clean damp hair . Spread evenly over hair and leave for several minutes. Then rinse with water. Additionally, use the Shining Velvet oil , which can be applied to both wet and dry hair.  
Release form:
500 ml bottle
name: Barex Contempora Smoothing Hair Shampoo Shining with Argan Oil and Sea Buckthorn Oil Velvet Shampoo 500ml

description:
Specific Features:
Burdock extract works on the greasy roots with an astringent and purifying action, while a series of active elements, including panthenol, act along the entire length of the hair, attaching themselves particularly to the damaged areas.
Silk and Linseed in the formulation: 
Silk Proteins: Ensure ideal hydration by forming a protective film which prevents excessive evaporation of the hair and scalp's moisture content. 
Linseed extract performs and effective restructuring and elsatifying action. 
Application:
Apply onto wet hair and gently massage. Wait a few minutes then rinse. Repeat if  necessary.
Result: 
Hair twice as easy to comb and twice as shiny from roots to tips.
name: Paraben Free Barex OLIOSETA Silk and Linseed Shampoo 250ml
